revised_title: Charge Operator Eigenvalues and Radiative Corrections
tldr: The authors explore the eigenvalues of the charge operator in quantum field theory, demonstrating that a state corresponding to incoming particles is an eigenstate of the charge operator. They also discuss radiative corrections to scattering in a weak external field and show that the charge renormalization condition leads to the same value for the coupling constant as when using the condition of vanishing radiative corrections to the Rutherford formula in the non-relativistic limit.
